abstract: Where can you order a Blizzard? Maybe Martin Herbach knows.
snippet: Where can you order a Blizzard? Maybe Martin Herbach knows.
lead_paragraph: Anthony J. Salvia gives us a good Monday gimmick today. The underlying theme is very straightforward, but requiring a Q in each of the four theme answers makes it more interesting. The Scrabble count ends up being very high, and the grid is just a J short of covering the entire alphabet.

headline.main: The Cranium Contents of Martin Herbach
